p: The various chemical and physical soil properties were compared between the two groups of sites (reported versus not reported RVF mortalities) using the non-parametric van der Waerden test [ 35]. This test if the equality of population means remains valid for data that are not normally distributed [ 35]. The comparisons were conducted per layer and for the average of the first three layers for chemical and physical analyses, and for the single sampled layer for mineralogical, microbiology, and active carbon analyses.
